title: Cooking In The Demon Castle  It's A White Workplace, Even Though It's Filled With Scary Demons
alternative_title: 魔王城で料理番～怖い魔王がいっぱいなのに、ホワイトな職場です～
status: 魔王城で料理番～怖い魔王がいっぱいなのに、ホワイトな職場です～
description:
Description :
        Tsumugi, a person working in the dining room of Demon Castle, is a transition of a different world.A different world Gurumerab comedy that struggles with bad Kowamote demons in order to protect the dream life of clothing, food and shelter.
